post:
**What do you get?**

Our enterprise HP Bl460c Blades and D2220 all SSD Storage arrays (12x 900GB SSD in RAID 50) running KVM. 

    1 Intel E5-2660v2 CPU Core (100%, no throttle)
    1GB RAM
    1 x IPV4 IP
    FREE IPV6 IP
    20GB SSD Storage
    10GB Snapshot Storage
    500Mbps Internet Uplink
    1000GB Monthly Transfer
    24/7 Support / Firewall

**Where?**
All - [https://dediserve.com/locations](https://dediserve.com/locations)

**How much?**
USD$5.50 / EUR€5 / GBP£3.95 per month
Buy Annual and get two months free (so $55 / €50 / £39.50 )

**Speeds?**
Check looking Glass for locations at http://lg.dediserve.com

**Order**
https://manage.dediserve.com/index.php?cmd=module&module=54&cid=676
